resources.string: This is is my title Fragment
Ni ikihe gihugu gitinze muri East African community muri ibi bihugu bikurikira?

This application was created by Ally Nkundibiza who currently holds a masters degreen in Electronics and Electronics and enjoy anything that havs to do with programming. He has been programing for quite a while And currently has a sheer number of project that he is working on. He wrote his Master thesis on The implementation of the 5G algorithm in order to improve efficiency of communication. He dream to Work as a software developer in firmware
